hanzi-su-wiki:
姉

Значения

Старшая сестра

Мнемоника


Девушка 女, раньше других сестёр вышедшая замуж, должна ходить на рынок 市. На ней — домашние хлопоты.

Варианты

姐, 姊
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiě
Japanese variant of 姐 ; older sister
Японский вариант 姐; старшая сестра
rtega_mnemonic:
姉姉RS
X		elder sister
  • the time during the life of a woman 女 when she menstruates - dyes cloth 市; married women have a baby every year: 嬰
妹; 伯

姉姉RSelder sister
  • woman 女 old enough to go by herself to the city market 市
妹; 伯
heisig_constituent: elder sister, woman, market, top hat, towel
heisig_story: Of all the women of the family, it is the elder sister who has the duty to go to market to do the shopping.
koohiiStory1: Unlike the younger sister (妹), who is not yet old enough to date... the elder sister is on the market!
koohiiStory2: She´s old enough to be allowed to go to the market.
jp_example_words:
姉妹(きょうだい): sisters
従姉妹(いとこ): female cousin
姉妹(しまい): sisters
姉(あね): older sister
お姉さん(おねえさん): (polite) older sister, (vocative) "Miss?"
WaniKani_Kanji_Meaning: Older Sister, Big Sister, Elder Sister
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The only woman in this city is your older sister. She's the only woman surrounded by a bunch of men, but she's following her dreams in the big city.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You want to go to the city someday, but you're not old enough yet, like your older sister is.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your older sister may have moved to the city, but she kept her pet sheep (し) with her. Now the only woman in the city is your older sister, and the only sheep is her pet.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture your older sister and her sheep walking through the city. Everyone turns to stare at them, because they're the only ones of their kind.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 市 (いち、シ город, рынок).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the woman (女) in the market (市) is your elder sister

姉字的基本解释

姉
zǐ
古同“姊”。

姉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǐ］
［《廣韻》將几切，上旨，精。］
亦作“姉1”。
(1)女兄，姐姐。
(2)称母亲。

姉字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　姉； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页258第14
【廣韻】將几切【集韻】【韻會】蔣兕切【正韻】祖似切姐本字【爾雅·釋親】男子謂女子先生爲姉。【釋名】姉，積也，猶日始出，積時多而明也。【詩·邶風】遂及伯姉。　又北齊太子稱生母爲姉姉。至宋則呼嫡母爲大姉姉，妻之于嫡母亦然。宋高宗母韋后，稱?宗后爲大姉姉。語見【后妃本傳】。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋親】男子謂女子先生曰姉。〕　謹照原文曰姉改爲姉。
姉字的源字形

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
姉字的起名意思

暂无。

Gu Tong "sister".
Sister
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zǐ］
["Guangyun" has several cuts, the purpose, and the fine. ]
Also known as "Sister 1".
(1) Brother and sister.
(2) Call the mother.
Sister
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　 Sister; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 258 14
[Guang Yun] Cut a few pieces [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Jiang Siqi [Zheng Yun] The original character of the ancestor is like cutting sister [Erya·Shiqin] The man said that the woman is the sister. [Shiming] Sister, accumulate, come out in the still day, accumulate time and clear. [Poetry·Bei Feng] Then and my uncle.　The prince of Northern Qi also called his birth mother his sister. In the Song Dynasty, he called the auntie as the eldest sister, and so did the wife and the auntie. Empress Wei, the mother of Song Gaozong, called Empress Zong the eldest sister. See [The Biography of Empress Concubine]. Textual research: [[Erya·Shiqin] The man said that the woman’s husband is her sister. 〕 　 I would like to say that elder sister changed to elder sister according to the original text.

zǐ
яп. вм. 姊

姉

Значения

Старшая сестра

Мнемоника


Девушка 女, раньше других сестёр вышедшая замуж, должна ходить на рынок 市. На ней — домашние хлопоты.

Варианты

姐, 姊

Radicals: 女, 市  (woman, city)
Meaning Mnemonic
The only woman in this city is your older sister. She's the only woman surrounded by a bunch of men, but she's following her dreams in the big city.
You want to go to the city someday, but you're not old enough yet, like your older sister is.
Reading Mnemonic
Your older sister may have moved to the city, but she kept her pet sheep (し) with her. Now the only woman in the city is your older sister, and the only sheep is her pet.
Picture your older sister and her sheep walking through the city. Everyone turns to stare at them, because they're the only ones of their kind.

Фонетик: 市 (いち、シ город, рынок).
